entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Vector.Create #94384
  • MemoryMappedViewAccessor: Dispose flushes on temporary files #94383
  • Blazor WASM NET 6.0 app fail to build with NET8 RC2 SDK under Framework #94379

Closed

  • Configuration binder failing on 7.0-alpine on GCP Kubernetes #94336
    9.0.0
  • Determine whether running in NativeAOT at runtime #94380
  • API Proposal: Unsafe.IsNullRef(ref readonly) #73608
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix passing message as paramName #94389
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #94388
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] When local space overflows, retry compilation with optimization enabled #94381
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Clean up S.N.Tensors project in main #94378
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Merged

  • Fixed xml-doc comments in OptionsServiceCollectionExtensions.AddOptionsWithValidateOnStart #94385
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 119.0.6045.105, windows: 119.0.6045.105 #94377
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Update NotNullIfNotNull documentation #93750
    area-Meta
